character.statement: Don't trust anyone. Nothing is as it seems.
Something about this place is very odd. I feel darkness.
To find Mrs. Which, we need to get closer to the light.
You did it! Now I can go save my father.
OK, let's climb up high so we can get away from these strange kids.
I'm scared. This is creepy. I can feel the darkness too.
You can conquer the darkness by being the light.
